title: Escaped kangaroo and two joeys are spotted hopping around near English market town
text:
An ‘escaped kangaroo’ has been spotted hopping around near a quiet market town.

The marsupial was captured on camera standing in long grass near Bullwell, Nottinghamshire, yesterday.

Police shared the snap on social media and said the mother may have two joeys with her. They have appealed for the public to help track down the trio.

But some Twitter users were not convinced – with one suggesting it was a German shepherd dog or alligator.

This image of the kangaroo was captured and sent to the Bulwell, Rise Park and Highbury Vale Police in Nottinghamshire, before being shared on Facebook yesterday

Another person said the animal could be a couple of dogs, one standing and one sitting, as another chipped in saying it could be a wallaby similar to those in Australia or even a fox on its back legs.

Police in Bulwell, Nottinghamshire, posted the picture of a mysterious animal appearing to stand poised in the countryside and suggested it could be a 'Bulwell ness monster'.

They captioned the photo: 'G’day Bulwell, this picture was taken this morning in Bulwell, I think you’re thinking what I’m thinking and I think we might be right mate.

The police have asked people to call them if they spot a 'Red, Skippy or Joey' nearby (file picture of a mother kangaroo with a joey in her pouch)

'There’s a Kangaroo in Bulwell and we believe she has two Joeys in tow. They were seen hopping around on the old pit site this morning. So if you see Red, Skippy or Joey bouncing around near you give us a ring.'

Their message has sent the internet into meltdown with 1.2k shares and people saying: 'Sod the Aussy trip, let’s nip here to see a Kangaroo.'

Kimmy Joe added: 'Just seen it hop out snapewood shop with two cans of Stella.'

Sarah Wagg said: 'Think someone needs an animal picture book.'

Denise Caldwell wrote: 'I see an german shepherd could be and aligator would have to go look for myself lol.'

Bulwell's Police wrote a witty response: 'We’ve looked into this report and nothing’s jumping out at us - but if you see anything out back, hop to it and let us know!'
description: An animal which is believed to be a kangaroo has been snapped hopping around Bulwell, Nottinghamshire, in pictured shared by Bulwell Police on Facebook yesterday.
